definition: sordid and contemptible (idiom); vile and repulsive (esp. character or action)

sentences.english: They were rich men. They were also nasty men.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是有錢人，但也都是卑鄙齷齪的傢伙。

sentences.english: His uncle was as base and unworthy as his father had been upright and honourable.
sentences.chinese: 他的叔叔卑鄙齷齪，不像他父親那樣正直可敬。

sentences.english: His uncle was as base and unworthy as his father had been upright and honorable.
sentences.chinese: 他的叔叔卑鄙齷齪，不像他父親那樣爲人正直。

sentences.english: He's had something to pay him for his dirty trick, and he'll have more .
sentences.chinese: 他那卑鄙齷齪的詭計要受報應的，還得多受些呢。
